column4: yoe...best would be to add a bug at launchpad and inform the devs
wouldn't that require me to have a launchpad account?
yes, it doesn require you to have an account...but that is easy to get...
I prefer not to do that. I've got way too many accounts already, I'll just forget otherwise.
well, your choice...but AFAIK is Launchpad for bugreports on ubuntu...
point being, I'd appreciate it if there were a way for me as a DD to inform Ubuntu people that "hey, you've got a problem there"
well, I am not a DD, so...I cant really help you there...:)
but if it is in main-repo...you should have that possibility
that's what I mean. I can understand them not caring as much about universe, but since they've put it in main...
well, as I said...I am not the right person to speak to...maybe a polite mail to one or some Ubuntu-Devs might help
I'll just post something on my blog (which is aggregated on Planet Debian). Hopefully that'll result in something.
frankly...blogs are in my opinionen not the right place for such things...its public..people get offended...
and I intend to write this in a totally non-confrontational way.
I did NOT say that...:)...people GET offended sometime
well, it is up to you...for sure...I'd just thought that a mail before blogging might help
sure. IME, there's not much difference there between mail and blog posts, though.
well, I think there still is...but as I said...it is up to you...:)
